sumarize_req: Cát Đằng Coffee (CDC), a popular coffee shop chain and trademark of Én Bạc Co., Ltd., requires a comprehensive business management system. With numerous branches nationwide, the system aims to consolidate and manage business information from all locations and provide support for local staff. Key functionalities include facilitating waiter order-taking to minimize movement, automating bill generation, and enabling the generation and viewing of revenue reports for each branch and the entire CDC chain.
